Description: You are not as you were before.
LevelDescriptionText: 0|You have forsaken a rite~1|The Rite of Greeting [This has increased your Hearts by 20 and reduced your Iron by 10.]~2|The Rite of Hearths [This has increased your Mirrors by 20 and reduced your Veils by 10.]~3|The Rite of Feasting [This has increased your Iron by 20 and reduced your Mirrors by 10.]~4|The Rite of Solace [This has increased your Veils by 20 and reduced your Hearts by 10.]
ChangeDescriptionText: 1|You have partaken in the Rite of Greeting.~2|You have partaken in the Rite of Hearths.~3|You have partaken in the Rite of Feasting.~34|You have partaken in the Rite of Solace.
Name: Abyssal Rites: Rite
